Author: BitsOfAByte
Name: GoodFriend
Punchline: Share various in-game events with your friends, like when you login or logout.
Description:
A client to communicate with the GoodFriend API to send & receive notifications with your friends.

Features:
- Private in design, no identifying information is ever sent about you.
- Send & recieve notifications when your friends login and logout.
- Customizable notification system for each event type.
